about_the_game:
A beautiful CEO was killed on the night of the banquet, and the perpetrator was hiding among the guests. As the son of a famous detective, how can you help the police solve cases with your intelligence?

This is a game with a suspenseful reasoning theme. As the opening installment of the series, it features a rich plot and vivid character images;

In this work, you can freely explore the scene, ask people and obtain clues from it, discover evidence, and explore the truth through association and reasoning;

The producer challenges the player's reasoning ability, and completing the game requires bold associations and careful exploration!

Please keep your eyes open, the suspect may lie and important clues may be hidden on the map;

This game encourages players to assist the police in solving cases in the fastest way possible, and the end will evaluate the player's reasoning ability!

What are you waiting for? Come and experience it now!
